info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 7:54PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CLACKAMAS AND CENTRAL MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM PDT... At 753 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Bagby Hot Springs, or 19 miles northwest of Detroit, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Molalla, Mount Angel, Scotts Mills, Monitor, Marquam, and Mulino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
